description_txt: stated on May 10, 2015 in comments on NBC's "Meet the Press":

quote_txt: An audit shows "there are 6.5 million people who have active Social Security numbers who are 112 years of age or older,"

description_txt: stated on May 10, 2015 in comments on NBC's "Meet the Press":

description_txt: stated on May 10, 2015 in an interview on CNN:
quote_txt: "We had the biggest drop of the rate of unemployment (in) all but 4 states."

description_txt: stated on April 17, 2015 in a speech at Politics and Eggs:
quote_txt: "On my last trip to New Hampshire, I think I met the guy who founded the first and only bank since Dodd-Frank passed, since the financial crisis. One bank in the country."

description_txt: stated on May 5, 2015 in an oped column:
quote_txt: On reauthorization of Export-Import Bank.

description_txt: stated on May 5, 2015 in an appearance at a high school in Las Vegas, Nev.:
quote_txt: "Not a single Republican candidate, announced or potential, is clearly and consistently supporting a path to citizenship. Not one."

description_txt: stated on May 6, 2015 in a Tweet:
quote_txt: "Hate speech is excluded from protection" under the First Amendment.

description_txt: stated on May 1, 2015 in an interview with reporters at the North Carolina GOP headquarters:
quote_txt: "There are more poor people today as a percentage of our population than the 1970s."

description_txt: stated on May 5, 2015 in an interview with NBC News:
quote_txt: "When we moved into the White House, we had the lowest net worth of any family since Harry Truman."

description_txt: stated on April 24, 2015 in an interview on WPRI-TV's "Newsmakers.":

description_txt: stated on May 1, 2015 in an interview with NBC's Andrea Mitchell:

quote_txt: "Baltimore spends the third highest per capita on its public schools."

description_txt: stated on May 4, 2015 in a website:
quote_txt: After laying off 30,000 people, Carly Fiorina said that in retrospect, "I would have done them all faster."

description_txt: stated on April 30, 2015 in a broadcast of MSNBC's "Morning Joe":

description_txt: stated on May 1, 2015 in a video:

description_txt: stated on April 27, 2015 in an interview:

description_txt: stated on March 10, 2015 in a symposium on water hosted by the Texas Tribune:

description_txt: stated on April 27, 2015 in his debut Senate floor speech:
